/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban structures. The road itself is lined with streetlights, standing like sentinels along the path. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
